name: Tourist Visa
description: Explore new countries for a limited time with a tourist visa.

name: Student Visa
description: For international students who want to study abroad.

name: Work Visa
description: Apply for a work visa to legally work in a foreign country.

name: Business Visa
description: Short-term visa for attending meetings, conferences, or trade events.

name: Family Visa
description: Join your family members living abroad with a dependent visa.

name: Transit Visa
description: Short stay visa while traveling through another country.

name: Medical Visa
description: For patients seeking treatment in foreign hospitals.

name: Investor Visa
description: For entrepreneurs or investors looking to invest abroad.

name: Exchange Visa
description: For cultural or educational exchange program participants.

name: Refugee Visa
description: Humanitarian visa for asylum seekers and refugees.
